short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds very realistic animated bugs (spiders and/or flies) to your chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small extension which adds realistic animated bugs to your browser. Has modes for spiders and flies (or both). Option to only show the bugs on a percentage of pages viewed.
